transcript:
Customer: Aapna jeun vyakti nku call karichanti, se ebe anya call re byasta achanti. Daya kari apekhya karantu kimba kichi samaya pare chesta karantu.

Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello. Hello good afternoon sir. Muskan this side from IndiaMART. Actually we have received a call on customer care number sir. So please tell me the issue sir.

Executive: What the problem you are facing? Yes sir aapne abhi call kiya tha sir 96 customer care number pe IndiaMART ke hai na?

Customer: Ji ji.

Executive: Hanji sir to kya dikkat pareshani aa rahi hai sir bataenge aap mujhe?

Customer: Ji ki mera jo byled mere ko theek kiya tha theek ho gaya tha fir bhi mere ko byled nahi aata hai.

Customer: Mapping mein mera thoda problem ho jata hai category mein aur usko theek kiya kiya tha lekin iske baad bhi mere ko byled abhi nahi milta hai.

Customer: Hello.

Customer: Hello.

(silence)
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving buyleads after issue was fixed.

- Mapping problem in category.

- None
